dcterms:creator: M. Aoki
dcterms:description: A dataset related to the Linear-Quadratic-Gaussian (LQG) problem with unknown gain, which has been a significant topic in dual control for over half a century.
dcterms:title: Linear-Quadratic-Gaussian (LQG) problem with unknown gain

dcterms:creator: P. Dallaire
C. Besse
S. Ross
B. Chaib-draa
dcterms:description: A dataset used for Bayesian reinforcement learning in continuous partially observable Markov decision processes (POMDPs) utilizing Gaussian processes.
dcterms:title: Bayesian reinforcement learning in continuous POMDPs with Gaussian processes

dcterms:creator: J. Deshpande
T. Upadhyay
D. Lainiotis
dcterms:description: A dataset concerning the adaptive control of linear stochastic systems.
dcterms:title: Adaptive control of linear stochastic systems

dcterms:creator: R. S. Sutton
A. G. Barto
dcterms:description: A foundational text in reinforcement learning that provides comprehensive coverage of the field.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction

dcterms:creator: R. T. Rockafellar
dcterms:description: A dataset related to progressive hedging in nonconvex stochastic optimization.
dcterms:title: Progressive hedging in nonconvex stochastic optimization
